title: Ashton Lambie plans to push a 64t chainring to break the 4-minute/4K world record today!
content:
Ashton Lambie is going for the record. Specifically, he is going to attempt to ride 4 kilometers in under 4 minutes. Ashton has been training hard and consulting with the best engineers and coaches around the globe for the best ride possible. The event will take place at the velodrome in Aguascalientes, Mexico, at 3:30 [â€¦]

The post Ashton Lambie plans to push a 64t chainring to break the 4-minute/4K world record today! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
